attributes.action: Install a pedestrian crossing outside Hallow Primary School in Worcestershire
attributes.background: The A443 main road through Hallow is a busy route where drivers often exceed the speed limit and it is a dangerous place for pupils, staff and parents to cross at the beginning and end of the school day. We would like a crossing to reduce the risk to local pedestrians and to calm through-traffic.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
